title: Quality of Life and Exercise Performance in Patients in Sinus Rhythm Versus Persistent Atrial Fibrillation: A Veterans Affairs Cooperative Studies Program Substudy
authors: Steven N. Singh, X. Charlene Tang, Bramah N. Singh, Paul Dorian, Domenic J. Reda, Crystal L. Harris, Ross D. Fletcher, Satish C. Sharma, J. Edwin Atwood, Alan K. Jacobson, H. Daniel Lewis, Jr, Becky Lopez, Dennis W. Raisch, Michael D. Ezekowitz
reference: Singh, S. N., Tang, X. C., Singh, B. N., Dorian, P., Reda, D. J., Harris, C. L., Fletcher, R. D., Sharma, S. C., Atwood, J. E., Jacobson, A. K., Lewis, H. D., Jr, Lopez, B., Raisch, D. W., & Ezekowitz, M. D. (2006). Quality of life and exercise performance in patients in sinus rhythm versus persistent atrial fibrillation: A Veterans Affairs Cooperative Studies Program substudy. JACC, 48(4), 248-181. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.jacc.2006.07.024
